European Quality of Life Survey Time Series (2011 only)

Source: R/data.R
eqls_2011.Rd

The EQLS dataset is a pan-European survey that captures both the objective conditions of citizens' lives (e.g., employment, income, health) and their subjective perceptions, including life satisfaction and happiness.

Usage

eqls_2011

Format

A data frame with 43636 rows and 44 variables:

id

Participant unique ID

wave

Data was collected in several waves, 2007 and 2011. This allows comparing countries over time.

country_name

Name of country participants resides in.

iso_code

Country ISO code

marital_status

Marital status

num_of_children

Item: Number of children of your own

rural_urban_living

Item: The area in which you live is...?

age_category

Age of respondent

education

Highest level of education completed

gender

Gender of participant

employment

Employment status

trust_people

Item: Would you say that most people can be trusted? | 1 ("You cannot be too careful") to 10 = ("Most people can be trusted").

freq_rel_service_use

Item: How frequently do you: Attend religious services, apart from weddings, funerals or christenings? | 1 ("Every day or almost every day") to 5 = ("Never").

freq_internet_personal

Item: How frequently do you: Use the Internet other than for work? | 1 ("Every day or almost every day") to 5 = ("Never").

freq_sports

Item: How frequently do you: Take part in sports or physical exercise? | 1 ("Every day or almost every day") to 5 = ("Never").

freq_social_activities

Item: How frequently do you: Participate in social activities of a club, society, or an association? | 1 ("Every day or almost every day") to 5 = ("Never").

vol_community_service

Item: How often unpaid voluntary work in the last 12 months: Community and social services? | 1 ("Every week") to 5 = ("Not at all").

vol_education_cult_org

Item: How often unpaid voluntary work in the last 12 months: Education, cultural, sports or professional organisation? | 1 ("Every week") to 5 = ("Not at all").

vol_social_charities

Item: How often unpaid voluntary work in the last 12 months: Social movements or charities? | 1 ("Every week") to 5 = ("Not at all").

vol_political_parties

Item: How often unpaid voluntary work in the last 12 months: Political parties, trade unions? | 1 ("Every week") to 5 = ("Not at all").

vol_other_organisation

Item: How often unpaid voluntary work in the last 12 months: Other voluntary organisations? | 1 ("Every week") to 5 = ("Not at all").

volunteering_frequency

Volunteering frequency | 1 ("Every week") to 5 = ("Not at all").

sei_left_out_soc

Item: I feel left out of society.

sei_life_is_complicated

Item: Life has become so complicated today that I almost can’t find my way | 1 ("Strongly agree") to 5 = ("Strongly disagree").

sei_not_recognised

Item: I feel that the value of what I do is not recognised by others | 1 ("Strongly agree") to 5 = ("Strongly disagree").

sei_looked_down

Item: Some people look down on me because of my job situation or income | 1 ("Strongly agree") to 5 = ("Strongly disagree").

sei_feel_close_to_people

Item: I feel close to people in the area where I live | 1 ("Strongly agree") to 5 = ("Strongly disagree").

sei

Social Exclusion Index

mwbi_felt_cheerful

Item: Which is closest to how you have been feeling over the last 2 weeks? - I have felt cheerful and in good spirits | 1 ("All of the time") to 6 = ("At no time").

mwbi_felt_calm

Item: Which is closest to how you have been feeling over the last 2 weeks? - I have felt calm and relaxed | 1 ("All of the time") to 6 = ("At no time").

mwbi_felt_active

Item: Which is closest to how you have been feeling over the last 2 weeks? - I have felt active and vigorous | 1 ("All of the time") to 6 = ("At no time").

mwbi_felt_fresh

Item: Which is closest to how you have been feeling over the last 2 weeks? - I woke up feeling fresh and rested | 1 ("All of the time") to 6 = ("At no time").

mwbi_life_is_interesting

Item: Which is closest to how you have been feeling over the last 2 weeks? - My daily life has been filled with things that interest me | 1 ("All of the time") to 6 = ("At no time").

mwbi_felt_tense

Item: Which is closest to how you have been feeling over the last 2 weeks? - I have felt particularly tense | 1 ("All of the time") to 6 = ("At no time").

mwbi_felt_lonely

Item: Which is closest to how you have been feeling over the last 2 weeks? - I have felt lonely | 1 ("All of the time") to 6 = ("At no time").

mwbi_felt_downhearted

Item: Which is closest to how you have been feeling over the last 2 weeks? - I have felt downhearted and depressed | 1 ("All of the time") to 6 = ("At no time").

mwbi

WHO-5 mental wellbeing index

wlbc_too_tired_household

Item: I have come home from work too tired to do some of the household jobs which need to be done | 1 ("Several times a week") to 6 = ("Less often/rarely").

wlbc_fam_responsibilities

Item: It has been difficult for me to fulfil my family responsibilities because of the amount of time I spend on the job | 1 ("Several times a week") to 6 = ("Less often/rarely").

wlbc_cannot_focus_on_work

Item: I have found it difficult to concentrate at work because of my family responsibilities | 1 ("Several times a week") to 6 = ("Less often/rarely").

wlbc

Work-life balance conflict

hrs_work_first_job

Item: How many hours do you normally work per week in your main job? | (80hrs or more).

hrs_work_additional_job

Item: About how many hours per week did you work in this additional job? | (60hrs or more).

work_hrs

The total number of working hours.

Source

European Foundation for the Improvement of Living and Working Conditions. (2015). European Quality of Life Time Series, 2007 and 2011: Open Access. UK Data Service. SN: 7724, DOI: http://doi.org/10.5255/UKDA-SN-7724-1.
